</div>
</div><div class="gridBoxRow" style="gap: 0px; margin-top: 0px;"><div class="gridBoxItem"><div class="navBlock">
<a href="/Mishneh_Torah%2C_Murderer_and_the_Preservation_of_Life" class="navBlockTitle"><span class="contentSpan he" lang="he">הלכות רוצח ושמירת נפש</span></a>
</div>
</div><div class="gridBoxItem placeholder">
</div>
</div>
</div>
